Chinese: 创造线条方法: \n按住画面任一点画线直到放开
Taiwan: 創造線條方法: \n按住畫面任一點畫線直到放開
English: Create line method: \nPress and hold any point on the screen until you release

Chinese:
创造线条方法: 
按住板机画线直到放开 

按下选单按钮即可选择离开
Taiwan:
創造線條方法: 
按住板機畫線直到放開 

按下選單按鈕即可選擇離開
English:
Create line method: 
Hold the trigger to draw line until you release 

Press the menu button to choose whether to leave

Chinese: 消除线条方法: \n对准绿色起始点按住后,开始消除线并跟着路线往红色终点
Taiwan: 消除線條方法: \n對準綠色起始點按住後,開始消除線並跟著路線往紅色終點
English:
Clear the line method: 
After pressing the green starting point,start to clear the line and follow the route to the red end 

Press the menu button to choose whether to leave

Chinese:
消除线条方法: 
手柄对准绿色起始点后,按住板机开始消除线并跟着路线往红色终点 

按下选单按钮即可选择离开
Taiwan:
消除線條方法: 
手柄對準綠色起始點後,按住板機開始消除線並跟著路線往紅色終點 

按下選單按鈕即可選擇離開
English:
Clear the line method: 
After the controller is aligned with the green starting point,click and hold the trigger to clear the line and follow the route to the red end 

Press the menu button to choose whether to leave

Chinese: 确认完操作方法后按下板机关闭选单
Taiwan: 確認完操作方法後按下板機關閉選單
English: After confirming the operation method, press the trigger to close the menu

Chinese: 档名只能输入英文与数字
Taiwan: 檔名只能輸入英文與數字
English: File name can only be entered in English and numbers

Chinese: 档名输入错误或已存在
Taiwan: 檔名輸入錯誤或已存在
English: File name entered incorrectly or already exists
Whether to delete the current line
Whether to return to the main menu

Chinese: VR空间只能选择动态曲线,无屏幕,无镜像模式!
Taiwan: VR空間只能選擇動態曲線,無屏幕,無鏡像模式!
English: VR space can only choose dynamic line, no screen, no mirror mode!
